backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing contact submissions and service inquiries per principal with admin-controlled access and deletion logic.
feature_evidence.json: Defines feature evidence entries listing implemented features, affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries for many frontend source files used for build planning and documentation.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind and CSS variable definitions for theming, including light/dark OKLCH color tokens and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining SEO meta tags, language settings, root app container, and script loading.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes, theme provider, React Query, and linking all pages including Privacy Policy.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: About section component with multilingual content, founder info, mission statement, and feature cards.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Contact form component handling service inquiries with validation, translations, actor mutation calls, and UI cards.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a multilingual footer with quick links, services list, contact info, and social icons, using navigation and language-based translations.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Creates a responsive, bilingual header with navigation, language switching, call button, and mobile menu behavior.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Displays a bilingual hero section with branding, headlines, background visuals, and CTA buttons for services and WhatsApp.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Wraps the app with a language context and renders the header, routed content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/PaymentTerms.tsx: Fetches and shows payment term percentages with translations, including loading skeletons and styled cards.
frontend/src/components/RateList.tsx: Loads pricing data, applies a 20% discount, and displays multilingual package cards and optional extra services.
frontend/src/components/Services.tsx: Fetches services through an actor, adds extra design-related items, and displays them with icons and featured highlighting.
frontend/src/components/SpecialOffers.ts: Shows two promotional offers with images and CTA buttons, using language-based translations.
frontend/src/components/WhyChooseUs.tsx: Renders a translated list of reasons to choose the service provider, each with an icon and description.
frontend/src/components/WorkProcess.tsx: Loads work process steps from the actor and displays them in a four-step layout with icons and numbering.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, and identity persistence using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating service, pricing, submissions, and inquiry data through an ICP actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers, custom CSS variables, themes, utility classes, and animations for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Implements an admin login interface and displays submission and inquiry management tools after authentication.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the main homepage sections using various components with language-based content.
frontend/src/pages/OffersPage.tsx: Shows promotional offers with multilingual support, UI components, and navigation actions.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Displays a styled, static privacy policy with sections outlining data collection and usage.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Renders services, pricing, workflow, and payment terms sections based on selected language.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and manage hash-based query cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, existing features, pending requests, and overall website configuration state.
